text:
@thehill Just like @senatemajldr did about:
-Russian election interference
-Trump/Kavanaugh Sexual Assault Allegations
-Witnesses during impeachment trial
-Initial COVID-19 aid (when he decided to recess Senate while House worked on Bill)
-Confirmations of unqualified judges
